dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC dataset is a benchmark in visual object category recognition and detection, containing images with annotated objects across 20 common classes.

dcterms:description: The MS COCO dataset is designed for object detection, segmentation, and captioning, featuring images with complex scenes containing multiple objects.
dcterms:title: MS COCO
